name: CID-Docs Dev Container
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'npm config set strict-ssl true && npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && echo "Installing dependencies..." && npm install && echo "Updating scripts..." && npm pkg set scripts.start="docusaurus start --host 0.0.0.0" && npm pkg set scripts.serve="docusaurus serve --host 0.0.0.0" && echo "Setup complete! Run: npm start"'
postStartCommand: sudo chown node:node /var/run/docker.sock 2>/dev/null || sudo chmod 666 /var/run/docker.sock 2>/dev/null || true
